name: Zero Space (Rguldborg, sumikuart, DragonIce)
description:
First of: Thank you for checking  this game out! It was made for  our first year computer sciencce exam project.  

This game was created by:

  • Sumiku-Art (Programmer, Artist, Writer)
  • DragonIce  (Programmer, Level Designer)
  • Rguldborg (Programmer, Writer)

What can you expect?

This is a roguelike. It does not hold your hand and it can feel unfair at times. Your goal is to get to the spaceships reactor before meltdown. You have a limited amount of time to get there and to do so, you have to traverse different sections of the ship. These sections is littered with enemies you have to take out to proceed. 

Who is the enemy?

Society of Zero, as they like to call themselves, was a seemingly friendly alien race, that wanted to help humanity. However, Society of Zero thought humans had a secret to life. Something unique they haven't seen before and they wanted to get that for themselves. Throughout the game you'll meet half a dusin enemy types, which all look unigue and it is important to study them for a successful run. 

But what can I do?

You will have access to different  human abilities as well as your normal attack. That is not all! You are not intirely alone in this endevour. The Ghost of Joseph Stone is helping you. You therefore, have access to supernatural attacks and abilites as long as Joseph gets his turn. While you'll only start out with a few attacks, abilities, artifacts and other items can be pick up on your way and you will be able to grow more powerful. Just be carewful, Some items can be... tricky.

The State of the Game:

The Game is considered finished. This project is purely meant to showcase every subject we have learnt the past year. We are proud of showing this game to the world as it only took us 4 weeks (20 work days) of programming.
